Undergrad Research Assistant

Undergrad Research Intern

Selected Projects

Browser-based data viz & analysis environment built with Flask, Pandas and D3.js. Application streamlined data analysis workflow for lab members.

Game of Life

Conway's Game of Life simulator written in python. Built user interface and custom widgets using the Kivy framework.

EELS Control Panel

Desktop app written in python to automate instrument control and data collection for a custom built electron energy loss spectrometer [EELS].
